data.actual_result: You get thrown to the far right of the list and can scroll past all the games untill they are off screen!
data.short_description: [Marketing Website][Mobile] Using 2 fingers to scroll by the "Access to $1000 of games" causes you to get moved to the end of it and over scroll the games
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to the new Nitro marketing page - discordapp/nitro - Scroll to the "Get access to over $1,000 worth of games" - Use 2 fingers to scroll left / right in the games list
